title: Ok, let's try again.
body:
http://i.gyazo.com/a60137719a276b1c4b3a931b33fea485.png

Why are kids in this game so scared to break the meta? I blocked his name so lol.
I'm not sure if they realize but before they joined ADC's used to be mid and they do well in the lane.

replies.body:
I sort of see why he trolled, I mean to be fair, 90% of Dravens in this elo are terrabad. 
In a sense it was justified.

"Dravens are usually bad, so instead of letting him practice Im gunna troll so he can't practice properly AND ruin everyone's time"
Your justifications are truly dumbfounding

"This trashy Draven should be allowed to practice a high skill cap champion in ranked and cost people LP, and will probably never use this champion again because of how hard he is" 
To put it lightly, your views are mildly disturbing.
Oh u were the draven that got kat fed at mid.

> [{quoted}](name=Grimrin,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=PrWjJ0wE,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-01-12T07:06:51.076+0000)
>
> Oh u were the draven that got kat fed at mid.

Yeppers.
That person wants to play LeBlanc? Just go bot LeBlanc with the support. She's ranged and can juke the harass and CC  so I think that could work.

> [{quoted}](name=Kartoffeln,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=PrWjJ0wE,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-01-12T05:32:32.044+0000)
>
> That person wants to play LeBlanc? Just go bot LeBlanc with the support. She's ranged and can juke the harass and CC  so I think that could work.

Nah she's trash and went mid anyway and trolled.

> [{quoted}](name=Sackboy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=PrWjJ0wE,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-01-12T06:04:05.412+0000)
>
> Nah she's trash and went mid anyway and trolled.

I assumed so, but instead of complaining she should have just gone like "Alright, let's do this."
Worst comes to worse, you two could have just lane swapped anyway and its not like this was ranked :P

It's cool that people break the meta, and while it's true that adc's used to mid, now it's mages and assassins that mid, both of which's job is to kill swishes (mostly adc's) so technically it's not the most solid idea, it doesn't mean you cant do it if you want to tho

But ALWAYS the first person to instalock is in the wrong, even if they called that lane, instalocking causes nothing but problems there is no benefit to the team,
However the second person to instalock the same lane is by far worse even if they called that lane, if you called and someone else instalocks, it's your responsibility to pick up the slack, not instalock yourself and %%%% it up,
I dunno which one of you instalocked first but you are both in the wrong and I bet the game didn't go so well because of that,

Also lb wouldn't have said 'no sorry I'm mid' unless he called before you, which hasn't been shown on the chat window, but seeming that we can see your call but not his it leads be to believe that he called before you we just can't see it because of the cropping
if that is the case then you shouldn't complain because it's your mistake that caused it (however this is just speculation)
Still your fault for locking in.
Draven mid isn't even that bad. I hate people that do this. Pick something off meta and then they proceed to call that lane and pick whatever (X lcs Player) just played or something "mainstream".

Tell the fella,

"This is MY league, MINE"

But really you got mid.

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=PrWjJ0wE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-12T04:36:32.248+0000)
>
> Tell the fella,
> 
> "This is MY league, MINE"
> 
> But really you got mid.

It's okay, he proceeded to talk %%%% and I'm not dodging so I just fed, well 'lagged' but whatever, everyone gets the same warning if they don't respect pick order.
You didnt block the names at the top of those still picking lol
